skillTree.localised_description: This altar, ridden with disease, has been gifted to Garbag as a show of the support Clan Pestilens offers in his attempts to capture Karak Eight Peaks.

effects.description: Mount: Plague Furnace

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%
Ability: "Don't Even Try It"

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The first step of any propa Waaagh is getting them damn gits to stop fighting one another.

effects.description:
Removes ability: "Animosity" for all units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Dawi are hard to kill, so Garbag developed an ingenious strategem - Goblins would stick 'em in the front, and Skaven would stick 'em in the back. Every angle was covered.

effects.description:
Ability: "Stick 'Em" for all Goblin units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Unit is attacking rear or flank

effects.description:
Ability: "Stick 'Em" for all Skaven units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Unit is attacking rear or flank

skillTree.localised_description: The proper encouragement, with a good kick in the ass, will get everyone moving in the right direction. And killing the right folks.

effects.description: Ability: "Get 'Em, Boyz!"

skillTree.localised_description: Garbag has learned a thing or two from the Skaven casters that are part of his force. Including who you have to pay off to get a bodyguard of rats!

effects.description: Ability: "Ratfriend"
Ability: "Beast Pack"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Rat Ogres

skillTree.localised_description: Dawi make stout doors and stouter walls. Which means a bigga boom is needed when you want to knock one down.

effects.description:
Explosive Missile Damage: +25% for Poison Wind Globadiers, Plagueclaw Catapult, and Doom Diver units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: By this point, Garbag has managed to bash his ragtag group together into a working fighting force, and the two sides have even begun to learn tips and tricks from one another.

effects.description:
Ability: "Strength in Numbers" for all Goblin units
	(all units in army)

Ability: "Opportunist Murderer" for all Skaven units
	(all units in army)

effects.description: Cunnin' Diplomat: Garbag starts with a military alliance with Skarsnik, diplomacy with Queek, and a trade agreement with both.
